title: An Act to allow peer-to-peer cardrooms

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Feeney, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 298) of Paul R. Feeney for legislation to provide additional entertainment choices for the residents and visitors of the commonwealth, promote tourism, and provide additional revenues through the authorization of the playing of certain games at facilities known as cardrooms which are to be located at licensed pari-mutuel facilities.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 11:00 AM-02:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                         and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Accompanied a study order (under JR10), see S2885
